line.comment: * race decided to backstab the player for strategic reasons, regardless of his reputation
* ultimatum is possible if called by ZH.Core (only on hard game difficulty)
* instant war declaration when called by ZH.Monitor (ultimatum time up) or when called by Mayhem.Capture.pl (player tried to get around ultimatum by abandoning or giving sector to someone else)
* Add-Ons 1.4: Fixed ultimatum being skipped. Changed labels to subroutines.
* ZH 2.0 - if the aggressor likes the player there is a chance that he offers an ultimatum
* reputation rank 7 or higher almost guarantees it
* ranks 1-6 only provide a small chance
* loyalty points adds 2%
* evil factions always have a small chance to betray the player, even if they like him very much
* Add-Ons 1.4: Chance is halved on insane.
* Add-Ons 1.4.8: Moved halved chance and clamping to after ethos modifies the chance. Also fixed clamping.
* ** DEBUG **
*$debug = 0
*if $debug
*$t = 'race: ' + $race + '; chance: ' + $chance
*write to player logbook $t
*$chance = 100
*end
* ** END DEBUG **

* faction sends an ultimatum to the player. The time limits get handled by ZH.Monitor. Mayhem.Capture.pl handles player actions - complying or refusal (abandoning sector or giving it to someone else).
* Ignoring the ultimatum after 1 hour, abandoning the sector, or giving the sector to someone else will result in a war declaration.
*if $debug
*$t = 'race: ' + $race + '; sector: ' + $sector.ultimatum
*write to player logbook $t
*end
* Add-Ons 1.3: No tutorial on insane.
* No valid sector for ultimatum. Declare war.
* Nope, we don't want to give an ultimatum. Declare war.
* Mordan9
* Standard war declaration message
* Player refused to comply with ultimatum.
* Add-Ons 1.4.3: All favors are now removed upon receiving a war declaration. Sorry, no workarounds!
* the next formal peace with them will be a Non-Aggression-Pact instead of a Truce
* MordanB - If A.I. declares war on you, you need to tell all your ships and stations that they are at war.
* Otherwise, they are dumb and often don't see the enemy as even being red. Used to have to manually do this through Global Commands.

sval.val: race decided to backstab the player for strategic reasons, regardless of his reputation
ultimatum is possible if called by ZH.Core (only on hard game difficulty)
instant war declaration when called by ZH.Monitor (ultimatum time up) or when called by Mayhem.Capture.pl (player tried to get around ultimatum by abandoning or giving sector to someone else)
Add-Ons 1.4: Fixed ultimatum being skipped. Changed labels to subroutines.
ZH 2.0 - if the aggressor likes the player there is a chance that he offers an ultimatum
reputation rank 7 or higher almost guarantees it
ranks 1-6 only provide a small chance
evil factions always have a small chance to betray the player, even if they like him very much
Add-Ons 1.4: Chance is halved on insane.
Add-Ons 1.4.8: Moved halved chance and clamping to after ethos modifies the chance. Also fixed clamping.
faction sends an ultimatum to the player. The time limits get handled by ZH.Monitor. Mayhem.Capture.pl handles player actions - complying or refusal (abandoning sector or giving it to someone else).
Ignoring the ultimatum after 1 hour, abandoning the sector, or giving the sector to someone else will result in a war declaration.
No valid sector for ultimatum. Declare war.
Nope, we don't want to give an ultimatum. Declare war.
Player refused to comply with ultimatum.
Add-Ons 1.4.3: All favors are now removed upon receiving a war declaration. Sorry, no workarounds!
the next formal peace with them will be a Non-Aggression-Pact instead of a Truce
MordanB - If A.I. declares war on you, you need to tell all your ships and stations that they are at war.
Otherwise, they are dumb and often don't see the enemy as even being red. Used to have to manually do this through Global Commands.
